verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> ha-Vu Give לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons אֵלִ֑ים <S%H410><s%> 'e-Lim; of the mighty הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> ha-Vu give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ka-Vod glory וָעֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> va-'Oz. and strength

[is] upon many

קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> kol- The voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בַּכֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> bak-Ko-ach; [is] powerful ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בֶּהָדָֽר׃ <S%H1926><s%> be-ha-Dar. [is] full of majesty

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol The voice יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD שֹׁבֵ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> sho-Ver breaketh אֲרָזִ֑ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim; the cedars וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> vay-shab-Ber breaketh יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh yea the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְזֵ֥י <S%H730><s%> 'ar-Zei the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-Non. of Lebanon

וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם <S%H7540><s%> vai-yar-ki-Dem He maketh them also to skip כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- like עֵ֑גֶל <S%H5695><s%> 'E-gel; like a calf לְבָנ֥וֹן <S%H3844><s%> le-va-Non Lebanon וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן <S%H8303><s%> ve-sir-Yon, and Sirion כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo like בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- like a young רְאֵמִֽים׃ <S%H7214><s%> re-'e-Mim. unicorn
קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> kol- The voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD חֹצֵ֗ב <S%H2672><s%> cho-Tzev, divideth לַהֲב֥וֹת <S%H3852><s%> la-ha-Vot the flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh. of fire

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol The voice יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יְחוֹלֵ֣ל <S%H2342><s%> ye-cho-Lel to calve אַיָּלוֹת֮ <S%H355><s%> 'ai-ya-lOt maketh the hinds וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֪ף <S%H2834><s%> vai-ye-che-Sof and discovereth יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת <S%H3295><s%> ye-'A-Rot the forests וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ <S%H1964><s%> u-ve-hei-cha-Lo; and in his temple כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lo, everything אֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mer doth every one speak כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> ka-Vod. of [his] glory

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לַמַּבּ֣וּל <S%H3999><s%> lam-mab-Bul upon the flood יָשָׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav; sitteth וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev sitteth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh yea the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech King לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for ever

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD עֹ֭ז <S%H5797><s%> 'oz strength לְעַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo unto his people יִתֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten; will give יְהוָ֓ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD יְבָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-Rech will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo his people בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> vash-sha-Lom. with peace
